
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
male <-
  read_csv(here::here("esselt21/hotdog_module/hotdog_male.csv"))

female <-
  read_csv(here::here("esselt21/hotdog_module/hotdog_female.csv"))
```


```{r}
female <-
  female |>
  mutate(dunkingEra = if_else(Year >= 2001, TRUE, FALSE))
```

```{r}
write_csv(female, here::here("esselt21/hotdog_module/hotdog_female.csv"))
```
